title: Meet HitchBOT, The Robotic Hitchhiking Wonder
teaser: With a bucket for a body and foam noodles for limbs, hitchBOT is a story-telling, story-collecting, hitchhiking robot invented by two professors. And it's just embarked on a trip across Canada.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
